desc: A family-run farm shop and garden centre set in the heart of Herefordshire. The Harrods of Herefordshire, a great day out for all the family. Shop our fresh produce from our butchers, food hall and deli or visit our homewares and garden centre. You can also stop for a spot of lunch at our restaurant.

layout.text:
"A great day out!"
Family run farm shop & garden centre since 1970.
